alert.note: Alert for Ogle; Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 7:34AM CDT until July 26 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ogle County in north central Illinois... Winnebago County in north central Illinois... * Until 815 AM CDT. * At 734 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cedarville to near Shannon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Rockford, Loves Park, Machesney Park, Roscoe, South Beloit, Rockton, Byron, Rockford Airport, Cherry Valley, Winnebago, Davis Junction, Pecatonica, Forreston, Durand, Stillman Valley, New Milford, Monroe Center, Leaf River, Seward and Adeline. Including the following interstates... I-39 between mile markers 111 and 123. I-90 between mile markers 1 and 18. This includes... Rock Cut State Park, Rock Valley College, Rockford Rivets Baseball, Rockford Speedway, and Winnebago County Fairgrounds. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
